L

Labyrinth - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the Main Class of the Game.This class is a Thread different than the JFrame UI thread because repainting with a JFrame should be done in a different Thread to prevent with redrawing constantly.
Labyrinth() - Constructor for class Labyrinth
 
last_update - Variable in class Animation
Time since the current scene has been changed
Lava - Class in <Unnamed>
This Class decides how Lava is represented and its animation.
Lava(int, int, Tile.ID) - Constructor for class Lava
 
Leeper - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represent the Green Monster that follows the Hero in Game.It's special ability is to Sleep and become a solid block as soon as it is in contact with the Hero.
Leeper(int, int, Tile.ID) - Constructor for class Leeper
 
leftbottom - Variable in class Projectile
 
lefttop - Variable in class Projectile
 
Level - Class in <Unnamed>
This class deals with how the Level is created and stored in the game.
Level() - Constructor for class Level
 
level_is_loaded - Static variable in class Labyrinth
Whether the Level has bene loaded yet
loadAssets() - Method in class Game
Load the main game Assets in Memory since they will be used often
